name: Speak Malayalam : Learn Malayalam Language Offline
description: Learn and Speak Malayalam from English, German, Hindi, Arabic, Telugu, Spanish, Tamil, Portuguese, Greek, French, Bengali via audios, phonetics, images and games.  The offline Malayalam learning app has 2,135 words with 55 categories. It contains pronunciation, images and phonetics of words for easy learning. Switch base language, Save learnings in EduBank, audio play, Potpourri and retention games are the main features of Speak Malayalam app.  Main Categories:-  * Travel * Interactions * Education & Learning * Wine & Dine  * Emergency * Food * Health & Medical * Home * Body Parts * Clothes * Colors * Country & many more  Features of Malayalam Language App:-  * SWITCH LINGO - Switch your base language. We have 11 languages to choose from.  * QUICK LIST - Learn common words under various categories.  * EduBank - Save your learnings with EduBank.  * GAMES - Revise your learning with games for better retention.  * TurboPlay - Listen to all audios in a category or list.  * Potpourri- View the words within a category in the form of matrix!  * CONTRIBUTE - Did you miss any word? Did you find any mistake in audio or phonetic or translation? Contribute to the app for user community.   * SEARCH - Search any word to get its phonetics, translation and audio.  It will help you increase vocabulary and converse in Malayalam. Download now!  We make SMARTY apps, Simple Masterly Approach to Refine Thinking for YOU.
